name: The One Hundred
description:
'''The One Hundred''' is an English crossover band from [[London]], combining elements of [[metalcore]], [[Punk rock|punk]], [[Grime music|grime]], [[rap]] and electronics. The band released their debut [[Extended play|EP]] ''Subculture'' in 2014 via Australian independent label UNFD and have toured extensively across the [[United Kingdom]] and Europe as well as performing at major festivals such as [[Sonisphere]], [[Download Festival]] and [[Reading and Leeds]]. In September 2016 the band announced via their social media that they had signed to [[Spinefarm Records]], a division of [[Universal Music Group]].

Their debut album ''Chaos + Bliss'' was released on 2 June 2017 and received positive reviews.

In July 2018 band announced via their social media that they have dissolved.
